Uses of Interface
org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile

Packages that use INIFile
Package
Description
org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile
The module INIFile provides an API to Windows-style configuration files, the so called 'INI' files, from the extension '.ini' of these files.
org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal
The implementation classes for INIFile.

  • Uses of INIFile in org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static INIFile
    INIFile.create(Path file)
    Creates an empty INI file.
    static INIFile
    INIFile.open(Path file)
    Opens the given INI file and reads its contents.
